Params: {3: 'Following the blurry phantoms, Lamia reaches a console piled with numerous monitoring devices.'}
{3: 'Turning the screen on, she sees the only useable program and quickly calls up its instruction manual.'}
{3: "There is, in addition, a bizarre schedule that's been repeatedly corrected, with both handwritten and printed corrections."}
{1: "1. Play hide-and-seek with ▃▆▁▂▄▁. He won't find you in places without surveillance.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '(▃▆▁▂▄▁ was supposed to be a deceased born to Mommy. People said his data was lost a long time ago.)', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '(▃▆▁▂▄▁ said, he came here to visit old friends and the Tree of Life.)', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '(▃▆▁▂▄▁ is going to help us. ▃▆▁▂▄▁ is going to watch over us. Besides him, I only trust Mommy and Sis.)', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'No, I gotta trust Dad. Dad is the only one who can keep us safe.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '3. Don\'t hit the researchers. I need to join the "Queen Bee System" tests. I need to earn points. I need to earn points. I need to earn points.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "I can't afford tomorrow anymore. I'm out of time. Only those who pass the tests get to earn points.", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '[Renting out lives and providing bodies for mutation experiments are the main sources of funding here.]', 2: '0e70bdff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "We shouldn't be subjects for body mutation experiments.", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: '4. Don\'t join the "Queen Bee System" tests.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Don't go haywire. Don't kill. Don't be controlled by Mommy.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Sis isn't Mommy's child. She's the only one who doesn't get controlled.", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'What if technology advances one day and they find out "emotional stability," "mind data stability," and "Tree of Life" compatibility are all unrelated?', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I don't want to do the tests. I don't want to do the tests. I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests I don't want to do the tests!!!", 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: 'Putting down the memo filled with madness, Lamia looks up and sees the notice about the "tests" on the screen.'}

{1: 'Starting April 1st, points are required for exchanging flavor enhancers for nutritional supplements and leisure and puzzle models.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Points are earned through training completion, experiment participation, and initial evaluation before distribution through the testing system.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Points are awarded after the completion of test questions, based on test results for unified settlement.', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: "Notice on Supervising Test Subjects' Participation in Tests", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'CB103 showed signs of frailty during the "Queen Bee System" test. To prevent a developmental hiatus, it\'s imperative to select a new Cthylla substitute early.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'According to existing research by Professor Kugawa Kurono, there exists a correlation between mind datafication and the emotional stability of test subjects.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Attention must be paid to the following when supervising test subjects' participation in emotional tests:", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '1. Test questions are merely to provoke thought. Supervisors must prevent subjects from skipping reading and thinking to control the tests.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '2. As the monitoring devices are the most accurate means of measurement, supervisors need to ensure they are correctly worn.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '3. Deduction of points is meant merely as a preview. Actual assessment will be based on feedback from monitoring.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1'}

{1: '4. Subjects with low scores will be prioritized for transfer to EBFM (Experiment Base for Frame Mutation).', 2: 'ff4e4eff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Do I have to wear all this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reluctantly, she picks up the connection sensor wire from the equipment, wrapping herself in it as the instructions dictate.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '...Uhm, it says here that I need to stay calm...', 4: '18'}
{1: "I believe I'm the happiest person in the world, and that all my needs have been met at this place.", 3: '50'}
{3: "I believe I'm the happiest person in the world, and that all my needs have been met at this place."}
{1: '1', 3: "The curve on the monitoring device reflects Lamia's true mental state as she lets out a wry laugh."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Seems like lying isn't going to get me anywhere... The score is just for preview anyway, so I might as well just tell the truth.", 4: '18'}
{1: 'These tasks and exercises that the administrator left me with are no-brainers.', 3: '50'}
{3: 'These tasks and exercises that the administrator left me with are no-brainers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "It's hard enough living in this world! Don't ask for too much!", 4: '18'}
{1: 'I have trouble sleeping or often wake up with a start.', 3: '50'}
{3: 'I have trouble sleeping or often wake up with a start.'}
{1: "I am willing to breed the dead; it's a great redemption.", 3: '50'}
{3: "I am willing to breed the dead; it's a great redemption."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Does everyone who is related to Cthylla need to sincerely answer "yes" to be able to survive?', 4: '18'}
{1: "I'm uninterested in anything beyond breeding the dead.", 3: '50'}
{3: "I'm uninterested in anything beyond breeding the dead."}
{3: 'Lamia feels dizzy looking at the remaining hundred-plus questions.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'XX003', 3: "Kana... the test is over. I've got some points left, and I bought the parts for the model ship that you were talking about before...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: 'Say... why are you always trying to make things happen for people? Is there nothing you want for yourself...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'XX003', 3: '...Well, I probably just want to see you and Mommy happy...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She looks down and changes the subject.'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: '...How in the world did you manage to bring the model ship here like this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'XX003', 3: 'I have a service robot that... Oh, here it comes.', 4: '1'}
{3: "No sooner has she spoken than the service robot places the box containing the model ship's parts on the lounge table."}
{3: 'With a wry smile, she shakes her wings, temporarily lost for words.'}
{2: 'XX003', 3: "Kana, what's wrong? Is everything okay with the test?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "It went well. Super well... I'm becoming Cthylla in an hour.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: 'We should put this model ship together now before I go!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Kana interrupts XX003 before she could finish congratulating Kana.'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "Silly me. We don't even have hands now, do we... Why in the world did I tell you that the model ship looked nice in the first place...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She lets out a deep sigh as she looks fondly at the picture of the ship—completed and glamorous —on the box.'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "Hey, why don't we have your service robot do it for us?!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "The ship is innocent and so are you. It's those bad guys that took our hands that we should hate!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Kana watches as the service robot opens the box and slowly assembles the model ship. She quietly moves up to XX003 and whispers into her ear.'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: 'Did you know that everyone is going to die if Mommy puts the Queen Bee System to work two more times?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "...They're trying to figure out ways to make Mommy aggressive, and that's going to waste everyone away...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: '...There is no avoiding it. Neither can I.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: 'People never know what they have until they lose it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "You're CB107's child. Mommy can't control you with the Queen Bee System because you aren't one of her children...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "And the researchers don't have enough points to afford tomorrow, which means someone is going to come and bust this place down soon.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'XX003', 3: 'Is that what that mister said, too?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: 'No. He showed me how, and I had to look into it myself...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: 'So, you see... Mommy plans to take her revenge on them before everything comes to an end.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: 'She wants to kill them all!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: 'That mister was right. They should become Trees of Life themselves if they want to be reborn so badly!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: 'Ahh, this is great! Hahaha! Serves them all right!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: 'The more they push the Queen Bee System to secure a future, the faster they bring about their own demise!!!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "Promise me... that you'll take good care of yourself when we're gone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "Because you're CB107's child, and you've got those wings that can take you to the world out there.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'XX003', 3: "...Why won't you take me with you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "We would if we could, but we can't.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "We would have loved to live on... to leave this place and see the real world out there... and see if it's as despicable as this place.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "But we don't have that option anymore, unfortunately...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kana Kurono', 3: "But you can't become Cthylla, can you? That's a good thing, though... you being the one that survives, that is.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'XX003', 3: '...But what am I gonna do without you guys?', 4: '1'}
{1: "Who's going to be there smiling for me<//XX003> down the road?", 3: '60', 4: 'd8002b'}
{3: "Who's going to be there smiling for me<//XX003> down the road?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Service Robot', 3: 'The ship is assembled. Kana Kurono, you have five minutes until the next item on your schedule.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a wry smile, Kana nods and follows the service robot out of the lounge, leaving XX003 standing alone in the fully lit room, lost.'}
{3: 'At that moment, XX003 wishes she could be the water chasing the ships—and not the reef that the water bypasses.'}
{1: 'Cthylla is a perfect mother, so I<//XX003> am not afraid. I<//XX003> am not afraid of becoming Cthylla.', 3: '60', 4: 'd8002b'}
{3: 'Cthylla is a perfect mother, so I<//XX003> am not afraid. I<//XX003> am not afraid of becoming Cthylla.'}
{3: "But that's not something I'll ever be able to ask for. I'm just a replica that looks a lot like the real deal."}
{3: 'In memories that should have been forgotten...'}
{3: "...she struggles, forcing a difficult smile at her mother with the same face as Kana's."}
{3: 'The smile works. The crazed woman hesitates for a second for her only beloved child—before anger quickly returns.'}
{3: "Yes, it's futile. Kana's wings are broken, and her hair has been combed by Mommy."}
{3: "Mother and Kana are the only people existing in her world. If Kana isn't coming back, what does it matter if she sacrifices herself for what remains of the world?"}
{3: 'The girl reaches for her wings that are causing her excruciating pain—and tears them off with sheer force.'}
{3: "As long as that means I can fulfill someone's desires."}
{3: "And as long as that means I won't be left all alone by myself."}
{3: 'Even her hair that hangs over her shoulders, she can cut it off with the blades on her wings.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'See... I look exactly like Kana now... right?'}
{3: 'The woman finally regains some of her composure as she trembles. Tentatively, she places her hand back on her head.'}
{1: "It's okay, if I<//XX003> can't fulfill your wish, then all I have to do is become someone else.", 3: '60', 4: 'd8002b'}
{3: "It's okay, if I<//XX003> can't fulfill your wish, then all I have to do is become someone else."}
{2: '???', 3: "Yes, it's me... Mommy... You didn't lose anyone..."}
{3: 'Worthless, the audience has disappeared, leaving Cthylla and Kana—the only things valuable—in this world.'}
{3: 'So, please... smile for me just once more.'}
{3: "—This is how you've always been navigating life, right?"}
{3: 'Memories and the cacophony of reality merge, turning into a flood that gushes into her already chaotic M.I.N.D.'}
{3: "Why is it that you'll never recognize me for the person I am as long as I am who I am?"}
{3: "—Our consciousness is too frail and can't be hatched. If we could become one, though... if we could become one..."}
{3: '—then we could be anything we want to be.'}
{3: 'The wires of the monitors tangling around Lamia have turned into red umbilical cords, connecting her to the giant red egg.'}
{3: 'It was only at this moment that she realized—that this test and machine had been a trap set for consciousness fusion from the start.'}
{3: "Cthylla's piercing screams flood into her room like a tide, swiftly overwhelming Lamia who is already on the verge of chaos."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Enticed by the screams, a plethora of Hetero-Creatures file in.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{3: 'The control room is sealed on all sides, leaving no way out and making M.I.N.D. connection impossible.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}

{1: '1', 3: 'They came with intense aggression, utterly different from the Hetero-Creatures that had surrounded Lamia before for a tentative attack. They now seem like they are acting with clear instructions.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{3: "The frenzy caused by the Hetero-Creatures causes the Red Tide to splash onto Lamia's lap.", 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{3: 'She has no more time to think, her consciousness plunges into the crimson sea.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
